posts.post_content:
Looking for these 3 cards to get my T205 collection started.
Edge/corner wear fine. No Paper loss or heavy creasing. Not trimmed or off centered. Looking for cards graded or pure in the range of 2-5's. Send me what you have at [url]plymouthpastor@hotmail.com[/url]
Thanks!
I have had one beater and one museum piece offered....looking for something in between!

Chris,
I sent you an e-mail about a week ago with scans of a group of T205's that included two Tinkers, an Evers, and a Chance (as well as a few others) that possibly sound like what you are looking for.  I never heard back from you.  Let me know if you didn't receive my message.  Thanks!

Marc
